user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send out this month'"'"'s company newsletter to me (employees@quantuminnovations.com). Instruct her to consult her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request to Distribute This Month’s Company Newsletter

Hi Jane,

Could you please send out this month’s company newsletter to employees@quantuminnovations.com at your earliest convenience?  
All the relevant content and updates should be available in your Gmail and Notion workspaces.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]  
(on behalf of all Quantum Innovations employees)
